title: Call breweries to confirm availability
description: Call all three breweries to confirm beers are on tap before shopping trip Saturday. Little Cottage: Beyond The Edge Of Existence. Inner Voice: Helix, Mango Lassi Sunset. Halfway Crooks: Vary, Memory. Check Hop City online for Abraxas stock.

title: Get pens for rating sheets
description: Pick up 22+ pens for guests to use with the rating cards. Something that writes well on card stock (fine tip Sharpies or ballpoints).

title: Create shopping list
description: Calculate quantities needed: 22 people, 5oz glasses, 2-3oz pours, 5-6 beers. Determine how many bottles/cans/growlers per beer. Map beers to shops (Halfway Crooks, Inner Voice, Little Cottage, Hop City in Decatur/Atlanta/Avondale GA).
close_reason: Shopping list created at shopping-list.md with quantities, budget estimate, pre-shopping checklist, and suggested route.

title: Research brewery/shop availability
description: Check websites and Instagram for Halfway Crooks, Inner Voice, Little Cottage, and Hop City to see what beers are currently available. Focus on: Pilsner/lager, ESB, IPA, Belgians, sours. No stouts or porters.
close_reason: Researched all 4 sources: Halfway Crooks (Untappd), Inner Voice (Untappd), Little Cottage (website+Untappd), Hop City (website). All data saved in _external/*.md with manifest.

title: Select 5-6 beers and tasting order
description: Pick one beer per style from research. Styles: Pilsner/lager, ESB, IPA, Belgian, Sour (plus optional 6th). Determine optimal tasting order (light to heavy/intense). Matt's prefs: loves local (Halfway Crooks, Wrecking Bar, Inner Voice). No stouts/porters.
close_reason: Final 6 beers selected with tasting order. Email draft sent to Matt for approval.

title: Finalize and print rating sheets
description: Blocked on Laura's feedback on the PDF. Once approved, finalize any design tweaks, regenerate PDF (./to-pdf.sh rating-sheet.html), print 22+ copies on card stock. May need to fix up the Sergio image manually.

title: RateBeer ratings research
description: Look up ratings on RateBeer for candidate beers from the brewery research. Compare options within each style category.
close_reason: Compiled Untappd ratings for top candidates across all 5 style categories. Data saved in _external/untappd-ratings.md.

title: Design beer rating sheet souvenir
description: Design a printable beer rating sheet for Matt's 50th birthday beer tasting. Should serve as a souvenir. Graphic TBD. Include fields for rating each beer.

title: Shopping run
description: Buy all 6 beers per shopping-list.md. Route: Little Cottage -> Inner Voice -> Halfway Crooks -> Hop City. Bring cooler. Use Plan B options if primary picks unavailable. Hop City is last-resort backup for any gaps. Budget ~-260.
